EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our Virtual Operator Conference! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
The webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/hePZXF2pUiVBsYWmVthxbf?]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 345678.
Stay in the loop with us and youâ€™ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/hePZXF2pUiVBsYWmVthxbf?]]>
